title: Time out: time to kill
brief_description: Discusses the effects retirement has on some people and looks at the problems of retirement when leisure is a full time job. When they leave work at 65, many feel cheated and futile, yet this should be their biggest opportunity to enjoy leisure. Some reap the full benefits of their retirement but what is going wrong for the others?
